command.name: route-map
command.abstract: add a route-map, i.e. a named BGP route filter

description.p: This command defines a new route-map. A route-map is a BGP route filter that can be shared in multiple BGP session filters. It can help reduce the memory footprint of simulations in case the same filter is used in multiple BGP sessions. It might also help write more readable simulation scripts.

see-also.p: Route maps are used by session filters. Session filters are defined using command bgp router X peer Y filterbgp_router_peer_filter.
It is possible to list all defined route-maps using command bgp show route-mapsbgp_show_route-maps.
